edu.ucsb.cs56.drawings.jstaahl.advanced

类 Pencil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.drawings.utilities.GeneralPathWrapper
      • edu.ucsb.cs56.drawings.jstaahl.advanced.Pencil
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Shape
    直接已知子类:
    SharpenedPencil

    public class Pencil
extends GeneralPathWrapper
implements Shape
    A vector drawing of a pencil that implements the Shape interface, and so can be drawn, as well as rotated, scaled, etc.
    版本:
    for CS56, W14
    作者:
    Phill Conrad, Jakob Staahl

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Pencil

        public Pencil(double x,
              double y,
              double width,
              double length)
        Constructor
        参数:
        x - x coord of upper left corner of the rectangle enclosing the entire pencil
        y - y coord of upper left corner of the rectangle enclosing the entire pencil
        width - width of the pencil (sales the eraser proportionally)
        length - length of the pencil (just the length of the wooden part below the metal ring)

        Get the height of the eraser in pixels
